1.description: I have eaten here one and the food was good. Yes the lady does lack communication skills but is to the point. I think that's good.  I order over the phone and pick up.  She makes exceptions for me at no additional charge.

2.description: If I could give this place Zero stars I Would. The lady of the house is SHORT, RUDE, and UNPROFESSIONAL! I've been there several times. If it weren't for her sons ability toClean up her inability to communicateEffectively I wouldn't patronize.  Thumbs down!

0.description: I go here quite often.I really enjoy their shrimp fried rice and shrimp chop suey. We also like their egg rolls. I have never had a problem communicating with anyone there. I amnice to them, they are nice to me.
